info.author: Ashish Pandey
info.description:
MailDiff
========

Automatically mails your group members the local changes you make in
your project

Installation
============

::

    >> pip install mail_diff

Usage:
======

::

    >> cd your_project_directory
    >> mail_diff

Then follow through the instructions

Examples:
=========

::

    >> cd Documents/scripts
    >> mail_diff
    Enter your Password: 
    sending mail to apndey.15@gmail.com .......
    mail sent

    sending mail to someone@gmail.com .......
    mail sent

MailDiff

Automatically mails your group members the local changes you make in your project

Installation

>> pip install mail_diff

Usage:

>> cd your_project_directory
>> mail_diff

Then follow through the instructions

Examples:

>> mail_diff
Enter your Password:
